location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Sir Bartle Frere

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Dr Abraham Nickson Hojel joining Pelly as the residency surgeon and regarding British subjects at Muskat who are of the opinion that the advice that they can return to Muskat at their own risk came from Pelly and not from the Government of India.The letter also proposes that Pelly use Bereniceto visit his agents and return Clydeto Kurachee [Karachi], regarding his Afghanistan journal and his thoughts on Sir John Lawrence and his policies.
